activities:
Kemin will use the information for business operations, employee development, admistration and planning, or when required in the course of judicial or administrative proceedings, suject to all nondisclosusrse safeguards available.
Kemin may share employee data with third parties that provide certain services to Kemin, including but not limited to outside accountants and lawyers, consultants and service providers.  Prior to transferring Personal Data among Kemn's subsidiaries or affiliates within the Kemin Family of Companies, Kemin will ensure that the protection and transfer of such Personal Data complies with Safe Harbor Principles.
